timeline.message: add udf user doc in Chinese
add udf user doc in English
move udf files into the system dir
add the apache rat in example/udf/pom.xml
try to fix the github actions (resize the test data for udf)
fix: parsing suffix path in logical generator
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/apache/incubator-iotdb into udf
enable to dynamically load UDF jar files
fix: get lib root on the Windows platform
enable the sliding step parameter for the sliding size window strategy
enable the sliding step parameter for the sliding size window strategy. add tests.
add doc for the sliding size window access strategy
merge master, fix conflicts and update version
set context classloader before udf quering
ensure that the system starts normally when loading UDF fails

timeline.bodyText: It seems that you don't need to new this UDF instance here

timeline.bodyText: You shouldn't create a new URLClassLoader each time register function is called. Instead, you can init the URLClassLoader in the constructor of UDFRegistrationService and call the addURL function to add the new class.
timeline.author: JackieTien97

replies.bodyText: It seems that the addURL method is protected and all URLs should be determined before the construction of class URLClassLoader. I don't know if there's a more elegant way :)
replies.author: SteveYurongSu

replies.bodyText: Maybe I can extend the class URLClassLoader to solve the problem. Let me have a try.
replies.author: SteveYurongSu

timeline.bodyText:
There may be a resource leak here.
I think you should unload the corresponding class in the URLClassLoader when the deregister function is called.
timeline.author: JackieTien97

You may obtain a copy of the License at + * + * http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0 + * + * Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, + * software distributed under the License is distributed on an + * "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY + * KIND, either express or implied. See the License for the + * specific language governing permissions and limitations + * under the License. + */ + +package org.apache.iotdb.db.query.udf.api.customizer.strategy; + +import org.apache.iotdb.db.exception.query.QueryProcessException; +import org.apache.iotdb.db.query.udf.api.UDTF; +import org.apache.iotdb.db.query.udf.api.access.RowWindow; +import org.apache.iotdb.db.query.udf.api.collector.PointCollector; +import org.apache.iotdb.db.query.udf.api.customizer.config.UDTFConfigurations; +import org.apache.iotdb.db.query.udf.api.customizer.parameter.UDFParameters; + +/** + * Used in {@link UDTF#beforeStart(UDFParameters, UDTFConfigurations)}. + *

+ * When the access strategy of a UDTF is set to an instance of this class, the method {@link + * UDTF#transform(RowWindow, PointCollector)} of the UDTF will be called to transform the original + * data. You need to override the method in your own UDTF class. + *

+ * Sliding size window is a kind of size-based window. Except for the last call, each call of the + * method {@link UDTF#transform(RowWindow, PointCollector)} processes a window with {@code + * windowSize} rows (aligned by time) of the original data and can generate any number of data + * points. + *

+ * Sample code: + * 

{@code
+ * @Override
+ * public void beforeStart(UDFParameters parameters, UDTFConfigurations configurations) {
+ *   configurations
+ *       .setOutputDataType(TSDataType.INT32)
+ *       .setAccessStrategy(new SlidingSizeWindowAccessStrategy(10000)); // window size
+ * }
+ * + * @see UDTF + * @see UDTFConfigurations + */ +public class SlidingSizeWindowAccessStrategy implements AccessStrategy { + + private final int windowSize; + private final int slidingStep; + + /** + * Constructor. You need to specify the number of rows in each sliding size window (except for the + * last window) and the sliding step to the next window. + * + * @param windowSize the number of rows in each sliding size window (0 < windowSize) + * @param slidingStep the number of rows between the first point of the next window and the first + * point of the current window (0 < slidingStep)

timeline.message: add udf query data iterator interfaces
support reset() in udf data iterators
refactor: rename some packages and some classes
update udf api defination and refactor api package
close and delete temp files when UDF queries end
provide Iterator type conversion methods in class UDTF
generate UDTF column headers in getQueryColumnHeaders
add tests for SerializableTVList and fix serialize() / deserilize() issues.
add tests for ElasticSerializableTVList: testPut / testOrderedAccessByIndex / testOrderedAccessByDataPointIterator
add apache rats for test classes
fix bugs in getTimeWindowBatchIterator(). add tests for batch iterators & reset()
add tests for SerializableRowRecordList. fix a bug in SerializableRowRecordList::readFields.
add test for ElasticSerializableTVList. fix bugs in ElasticSerializableTVList::getTimeWindowBatchIterator. rename some methods in ElasticSerializableTVList.
add tests for CreateFunctionPlan & UDTFPlan. fix bugs in the generation of UDTFPlan. provide more useful methods in UDFParameters.
add tests for UDTFAlignByTimeDataSet. fix bugs when generating row records for UDTFAlignByTimeDataSet.
add tests for UDTFAlignByTimeDataSet. (without value filter)
add tests for UDTFAlignByTimeDataSet. (with value filter)
fix bugs in PhysicalPlanTest / UDTFAlignByTimeDataSetTest / UDFRegistrationService. fix the pipeline.
modify tests for UDF physical plan
add ITs for UDF management. fix a bug in "show functions" process.
add integration tests for UDTF query module. fix a bug which may cause UDF column output data in a wrong type. remove useless fields in UDTFPlan.
fix a bug that may cause errors in cartesian product calculations. add tests.
fix the code style in UDTFExecutor
parallelize the execution of transform() in UDFs
parallelize the execution of fillBuffer in UDTFNonAlignDataSet
fix bugs: select udf with slimit/limit. add ITs.
remove layer point reader in udf package
a completely new strategy for executing UDFs: push-down strategy
update input layer RowRecordList's eviction upper bound in UDTF dataset
add a new udf example for IT. add a new constructor in SlidingTimeWindowAccessStrategy.
new memory control strategy for udf queries
new ElasticSerializableRowRecordList memory control strategy for udf queries
fix: SerializableTVList memory control strategy for long-running
fix udf sliding time windowing. add tests for udf sliding time windowing.
add Javadoc for udf package: collector & strategy
add Javadoc for udf package: config & parameter
add Javadoc for class UDF and class UDTF

change the strategy for naming temporary files
move hybrid tests to a new java file
add a test for udf query with multi attrs
